Date: 2025-06-23 11:51
Subject: Fw: *REMINDER*: Request to complete - Code of Ethics Training
--------------------------------------------------
Dear all,
Good morning. I hope you're doing well.
This is a reminder to complete the mandatory Code of Ethics training. As previously communicated, this course is essential to ensuring that we continue to uphold the values and ethical standards of our Group.
If you haven’t done so already, please make it a priority to complete the training as soon as possible.
You can access the course using the link below:
Take Me There <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=844&user=10195>  There <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=844&user=10195> 
Thank you for your attention and cooperation.

Kind regards,

From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>
Sent: Monday, June 16, 2025 11:45 AM
Subject: Fw: Request to complete - Code of Ethics Training
 
Dear all,
Good morning. I hope this message finds you well.
This is a gentle reminder to complete the Code of Ethics training. As members of our Group, it is essential that we all uphold the highest ethical standards, and this training plays a key role in that commitment.
As communicated earlier, this is a mandatory course. Please find the course link below:
Take Me There <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=844&user=10195> 


Thank you for your attention and cooperation.

From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 12:02 PM
Subject: Request to complete - Code of Ethics Training
 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/59490578d967747477092e6ff1d7c0e71968650286.png> 	
It’s time to complete the annual mandatory Code of Ethics training!
Staying familiar with our Code of Ethics is essential to how we act and operate as a Group. It serves as a guiding framework for each of us, empowering us to make the right decisions and consistently act with integrity, honesty, and respect—toward one another and the world around us.

This year, discover our new AI section in the Code of Ethics, and learn how to use AI tools ethically across the Group!

 Take 10–15 minutes out of your time to complete the training and make sure to fill out the acknowledgement form in order to obtain and upload your certificate.
